definition: to drop in/to visit/to lock a door/(of a shop) to close/to go and live with one's wife's family, in effect becoming a member of her family
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
surname Men
to come to sb's door/to call on sb
house call fee/callout fee
to close the door
to invite the devil to one's house (idiom)/to introduce a potential source of trouble

sentences.english: We shouldn't wait for relatives to come to our door before we take care of them.
sentences.chinese: 若论亲戚之间，原该不等上门来就该有照应才是。

sentences.english: Left to right and so on and so on cock not send red crown to the centipede, they come in person to discuss.
sentences.chinese: 公鸡左等右等不见蜈蚣送红冠来，就亲自上门讨要。

sentences.english: My father shouldered the door shut and carried the gift to our kitchen table.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸用肩抵上门，然后把礼物抱到厨房的桌上。

sentences.english: If you send in a subscription on the newspaper, it'll be delivered to your door.
sentences.chinese: 如果你订阅报纸，它会直接给你送上门的。

sentences.english: And when exactly did the police turn up?
sentences.chinese: 警察什么时候会找上门？

sentences.english: Beijing Tongzhou Dong Guan-site computer repair services.
sentences.chinese: 北京通州北关电脑维修上门服务。

sentences.english: " he asked his daughter. "When adversity knocks on your door, how do you respond?
sentences.chinese: 他问女儿，“当逆境找上门来时，你该如何反应呢？

sentences.english: Will you shut the door, if you please?

sentences.chinese: 你需要妹妹上门服务吗？

sentences.english: China's express delivery generally use the " downwind ", the on-site service.
sentences.chinese: 中国的快递一般用的是“顺风”，上门服务的。

sentences.english: Waiting for a meal, a moray eel hides in a sponge.
sentences.chinese: 一条海鳝静静地在海绵中守候猎物自己上门。

sentences.english: He hasped the door and asked me where I came from.
sentences.chinese: 他扣上门，问我是从哪儿来的。

sentences.english: Jotham rebuilt the Upper Gate of the temple of the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 约坦建立耶和华殿的上门。

sentences.english: Welcome home to see friends love bird bird.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎爱鸟的朋友上门看鸟。

sentences.english: You either buy them yourself or have them delivered to your home or office.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择自己去购买或是送货上门。
